name: SetVehicleVelocity
warnings: This function has no affect on un-occupied vehicles and does not affect trains.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Sets the X, Y and Z velocity of a vehicle.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the velocity of.

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The velocity in the X direction.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The velocity in the Y direction .

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The velocity in the Z direction.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The vehicle does not exist.
